name: Myhoa Lagoon - Kiting Town
address: thon my hoa, Phan Rang, Việt Nam
description:
Myhoa Lagoon - Kiting Town có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, nhà hàng và quầy bar ở Phan Rang. Ngoài câu lạc bộ trẻ em, chỗ nghỉ này còn có sân chơi trẻ em. Chỗ nghỉ có chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí và có cả dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

Tại khách sạn, các phòng đều đi kèm với điều hòa, bàn làm việc, sân hiên với view biển, phòng tắm riêng, TV màn hình phẳng, ga trải giường và khăn tắm. Các căn đều có tủ lạnh.

Khách tại Myhoa Lagoon - Kiting Town có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng thực đơn buffet.

Chỗ nghỉ có bể sục.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Liên Khương, cách Myhoa Lagoon - Kiting Town 131 km.

review.rating: Kì nghỉ quá tuyệt. Con người thân thiện gần gũi, cảnh thì quá đẹp.
review.comment_positive: Bà chủ và nhân viên rất thân thiện , dễ thương , dễ gần , dễ mến. Vị trí thuận lợi đi hang rái, vĩnh hy và đảo bình hưng , vườn nho đều trên 1 đương rất dễ đi, lại gần nữa. Quá tuyệt vời
review.comment_negative: Không có điều gì không hài lòng

review.rating: Bình thường
review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, gần biển
review.comment_negative:
. Cho khách dẫn cả bầy chó vào ị lung tung, nhảy xuống hồ bơi và đi lung tung trong nhà hàng
. Đang xây dựng nên khuôn viên dơ

review.rating: Warm and welcoming kiting town feels like family
review.comment_positive: a haven of tranquility and kite surfing excellence, tucked away in a serene, isolated spot that felt like an exclusive oasis. This resort has managed to create an environment that's both inviting and private, offering a perfect escape for those looking to disconnect from the hustle and bustle and reconnect with nature.
review.comment_negative: Off season, Phan Rang can be quite hot without the wind, but it’s still perfect to explore nearby experiences such as snorkeling or hiking to the waterfall.

review.rating: Probably perfect for kiting during the season
review.comment_positive: We were not the typical guests, it's probably a perfect spot if all you want to do is kiting. Helpful staff, very capable instructor, reasonably priced food with western options. We arrived at the end of the season, better enquire in advance. We did a few excursions (Phan Rang city, Vinh Hy village), it felt rather off the beaten track.
review.comment_negative:
The lagoon is shallow and dry at low tide so you need to plan your day around that.
Not a very lively area, just a few resorts on the beach and a small shop and road side restaurant, you'll need transport to get anywhere, the resort was happy to arrange scooters/taxis for us.

review.rating: My Hoa Lagoon is on perfect location for kitters, it is very nicely designed with very kind staff (specialy front office
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Location, very kind and supportive staff, delicious breakfast, billiard, kitting, swimming pool.

review.rating: The perfect location for your dream kite holiday 💛
review.comment_positive: Great location, amazing food, helpful staff and amazing kite boarding. I’ll definitely come again ☺️

review.rating: Great stay will go there again.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The rooms are new and modern. Excellent food and friendly staff.

review.rating: Perfect stay in breathtaking scenery
review.comment_positive: Beautiful location right on the lagoon!! Wonderful and helpful staff rented us a scooter and showed us beaches and waterfalls to explore. Great food and friendly atmosphere. 100% recommend staying here, you’ll have the time of your life!

review.rating: a place worth recommending
review.comment_positive: Staff, food, atmosphere

review.rating: the exact place for your kite holiday
review.comment_positive:
Camp is an absolute winner if you're looking for a cool mix of action, chill vibes, and a spot to get some work done. The kiting here? Awesome. You can hit the water right outside your door. But it's not all about the thrill – the place is super chill, perfect for kicking back or knocking out some work, and it's got a real homey feel to it.

The rooms? Top-notch comfort, more than needed for crashing after a kite session. And the food – it's perfect, homemade style, tasty, and clean.

But here's the best part – the people. The owner and the staff are like your personal support crew. Need something? They've got your back, always ready to help out. Makes the whole experience super smooth and fun. Camp isn't just a place to stay; it's like your cool friend's place where everything's just right. Totally recommend it for a laid-back, homey stay.
